title: Opinion: Same blood test, different results:  Why isn’t this common thyroid screening reliable?
description: Researchers have known for decades that different brands of lab machines produce different results. The fix is easy — but not enforced.
content: Researchers have known for decades that different brands of lab machines produce different results. The fix is easy — but not enforced.
